channel.title: Log in by a mod/admin/owner
channel.description:
kk guys i have a simple question how do i make it do this when an owner logs in?:
this when i log in:
[IMG]http://i1031.photobucket.com/albums/y380/mrpopyman/loginmessage.jpg[/img]
this when an admin logs in:
[IMG]http://i1031.photobucket.com/albums/y380/mrpopyman/adminlogin.jpg[/img]
and this when a mod logs in:
[IMG]http://i1031.photobucket.com/albums/y380/mrpopyman/moderatorlogin.jpg[/img]
can some1 plz tell me how to do this? thanks
